ing: 4 ice cubes, or more to taste
1 tablespoon almond butter, or more to taste
1 tablespoon chia seeds, or more to taste
des: "My almond butter and jelly smoothie is a spin-off of 'peanut butter and jelly' and it is my perfect mid-afternoon snack or sometimes even my lunch!"
ins: Blend almond milk, blueberries, ice cubes, vanilla protein powder, almond butter, and chia seeds in a blender until smooth.
